name: WooCommerce
description: Integrate with WooCommerce to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Products
tools.description: List products in the WooCommerce store. Returns product names, prices, stock status, and SKUs.

tools.name: Create Product
tools.description: Create a new product in the WooCommerce store. Provide a name and optional price, description, SKU, and status.

tools.name: List Orders
tools.description: List orders from the WooCommerce store. Optionally filter by status or date range.

tools.name: Update Order
tools.description: Update an existing WooCommerce order. Can change status, add a note, or update billing/shipping details.

tools.name: List Customers
tools.description: List customers in the WooCommerce store. Optionally search by name or email.
